Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2013 05:48AM TheBooblessWonder wrote: Wow, I wish I would have found this site back when I was figuring out my wardrobe options.  I never realized so many women made the same decision to stay boobless.  My doctor made me feel like I was an anomaly just like my cancer.  I might have saved some money.  I became the Boobless Wonder 3 years ago.  I am a self proclaimed clothes hound, so friends received all of my fashion faux pas.  I finally have it figured out.  I admire all of you ladies who made the same choice despite what society tries to tell us.
Posts.Title: Wardrobe pics for boobless days mom2two ShadePink
